name: WPB Related Products Slider for WooCommerce – Show WooCommerce Related Products Carousel
author: wpbean

sections.description:
WPB WooCommerce Related Products Slider plugin will replace the default WooCommerce related products with a nice and smooth slider of all related products. The slider is fully dynamic, just active and it’s ready to show the slider of related products in single product page. No extra settings required.

The design of WPB WooCommerce Related Products Slider is very nice and standard, it will match with all kinds of WooCommerce store. It’s fully responsive so nothing to worry about the small devices.

It has settings to manage the style settings & some basic setups.

A WooCommerce related products slider can be incredibly helpful for several reasons:

  1. Cross-selling: It allows you to showcase products that are related or complementary to the one the customer is currently viewing, increasing the chances of them purchasing multiple items.
  2. Increased Engagement: By displaying related products in a visually appealing slider format, you can grab the attention of the customer and encourage them to explore more products, thereby increasing their engagement with your website.
  3. Enhanced User Experience: Instead of forcing customers to manually search for related products, a slider conveniently presents them with relevant options, saving them time and effort.
  4. Upselling Opportunities: You can use the related product slider to suggest higher-priced or premium items, providing opportunities to upsell and increase the average order value.
  5. Personalization: By leveraging customer data and preferences, you can customize the related product slider to display items that are most likely to interest each individual shopper, enhancing their overall shopping experience.

Overall, a related product slider can significantly improve the effectiveness of your product recommendations, leading to higher conversion rates and increased customer satisfaction.

Get The PRO Version | DEMO | Support

Plugin Features

  • Two different theme for related products slider.
  • Autometic related products output depending upon the product category and tags.
  • All devices supported responsive slider.
  • Flat type nice design.
  • Very light weight.
  • Work with all standard WordPress theme.
  • Easy to use.
  • Developer friendly clean code & easy to customize.

PRO Version Features

  • Select product specific custom relative products.
  • Show relative products slider form products tag match only.
  • Upsells and Cross-sells Products Slider.
  • Remove Out of Stock Products from the Slider.
  • Relative products order & order by settings.
  • Adding the related products slider to the product tab.
  • Enable or disable slider pagination, navigation, auto play & slider speed.
  • Option for choosing the number of columns in slider for small screen devices.
  • Style settings for changing colors of navigation, pagination, text, button and price.
  • Life time free update.
  • Free and quick support.
  • Free installation service ( if needed ).

sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin.

  • This plugin’s Related Products Slider will replace the default WooCommerce Related Products.

  • Go to this plugin’s setting panel for basic customize.

Available action hooks

  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_before_title’, $product )
  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_after_title’, $product )
  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_after_price’, $product )
  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_after_cart’, $product )
sections.faq:
How to change the theme of WPB Related Products Slider for WooCommerce?

Go to this plugin setting page, here you will see a dropdown for selecting the theme.

How can I change the background & color of WPB Related Products Slider for WooCommerce?

Go to this plugin setting page, here you will see some color picker for selecting the theme.
